Question
========

Of 9 subjects, before and after a given exertion of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 9 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 24 and the standard deviation is 34. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 2.12
* 2.55
* 2.72
* 12.89

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2.12: Correct
* 2.55: Incorrect
* 2.72: Incorrect
* 12.89: Incorrect
